description: johnson johnson through its operating companies is the world s most comprehensive and broadly based manufacturer of health care products as well as a provider of related services for the consumer pharmaceutical and medical devices and diagnostics markets we strive to provide scientifically sound high quality products and services to help heal cure disease and improve the quality of life as leading supplier of pharmaceutical and healthcare goods we produce and distribute our products worldwide within our johnson johnson enterprise supply chain our customer logistics services organization cls is responsible for all distribution operations on a global basis ensuring highest supply quality and reliability responsiveness cost competitiveness and access to technology innovation that fuels superior growth currently we are looking to complement our cls team with agile and service oriented distribution planning inventory manager at cee m f job purpose responsible for planning and managing instrument and implant supply at and cee region to the local warehouse final customers and orthokit facility accountable for inventory levels and effectiveness within the region managing a team to achieve goals and objectives responsibilities drive supply chain activities for assigned product portfolio including demand planning new product launch planning inventory planning and supply network planning own the global long term demand and supply chain strategy for one or multiple key product portfolios partnering with global strategicen marketing and new product management to develop demand scenarios and strategies lead and facilitate the at cee demand sales and operations planning s op process with regional marketing and commercial finance order to align market and financial requirements with manufacturing capabilities set and achieve annual at cee inventory business plan set safety stock levels manage inventory tracking processes and reconciliate i e actual vs plan identify and implement inventory reduction opportunities collaborate with manufacturing and or external operations on corresponding supply scenarios and strategies support and influence business planning and financial planning processes and leverage lean concepts and six sigma tools to develop and effectively implement advanced supply chain solutions processes and systems improvements build collaborative relationships with key stakeholders including marketing manufacturing finance external operations npi r d and quality provide thought leadership and direction to peers through training title: Senior/Expert Retail Model Validation Manager (m/f)
description: are you open to new ideas do you value creative freedom and live for cultural diversity do you desire mutual trust and responsibility would you like to work a bank that has grown over years and is active as a leading commercial and investment bank austria and central and eastern europe cee then you ve found just the right place at raiffeisen bank international rbi senior expert retail model validation manager m f department is looking for a motivated senior expert model validation manager to support the retail validation team the rrmv department is part of the rbi retail risk division and is responsible for the development and implementation throughout the rbi group of various retail risk methodologies including retail credit risk model development and validation concept papers guidelines and templates within the rrmv department the retail model validation team is the owner of the validation framework and manages the validation process across rbi group for all retail credit risk models the retail model validation team ensures that all retail rating systems and credit risk models rbi group are developed applied and functioning compliance with the regulatory and business requirements and needs your task contribute to the development and implementation of group wide framework methods and processes for initial and periodic validation of newly developed as well as already implemented retail credit risk models for crr pillar pillar and ifrs contribute to the development and implementation of group wide standards and concepts for model management and model risk management interpret and translate regulatory requirements towards irb and icaap compliance into standards for the rbi group support and oversight of the implementation of these standards execute the group wide plan for validation activities execute the plan line with the regulatory needs and business expectations organize validation committee sessions maintain the validation platform and workflows along the model lifecycle prepare comprehensive model and rating systems validation reports initiate applied validations based on the outcome of the validation process to reduce model risk design and roll out of model documentation and model review templates support to rbi network units understanding the model documentation requirements and the validation standards participate internal discussions and acceptance of new modelling methodologies from validation point of view demonstrate compliance with the regulatory standards of the validation framework process and validation outcome to group auditors and regulatory authorities ecb oenb jst ncas report and rbi group risk committee of the outcome of the validation process for the retail rating systems and models rbi group your qualifications university degree mathematics statistics econometrics or economic sciences with strong quantitative focus minimum of professional experience risk management of a bank financial institution or consultancy company at least years of practical experience with credit risk model validation or development preferably irb compliant institution strong knowledge and practical experience with sas or other statistical software excellent understanding of bank business model as well as deep know how of credit origination and management processes excellent knowledge of basel crr ias and ifrs excellent command of english knowledge of german language is advantage very good communication negotiation and presentation skills a multinational environment self organized flexible able to run under time pressure your benefits join our dynamic and motivated team one of the leading banking groups austria and central and eastern europe eur senior eur expert annual gross salary inkl overtime additional payment according to skills and experience work life balance due to variable working hours state of the art learning and development opportunities we are looking forward to title: Associate (m/f)
description: speedinvest is a leading european venture capital fund for tech start ups we work alongside entrepreneurs to achieve a common goal of building great companies due to our global partner network that includes operations silicon valley we have become a key investment and development hub for europe s start up community we are involved early stage investments and specialise operational advisement our company philosophy states that we only work with projects where we can have a truly purposeful long term impact by offering experience combined with the right network associate m f at speedinvest vienna your responsibilities as a speedinvest associate you act as a junior investment manager you be responsible for trend scouting industry analysis number crunching and research additionally you support deal sourcing and due diligence for investment opportunities as well as providing operational support to our portfolio companies this means assisting start ups with business development e g sales support communication and the preparation of sales pitch as well as any other critical company functions we need someone who is a start up aficionado reads techcrunch as part of their daily routine and would pick pioneers as their festival of choice understands acronyms such as cac ltv liqpref has completed a master s degree any technical background would be a plus has eith worked a start up or consultancy for a minimum of two years loves numbers structure and results enjoys presenting representing and networking is well acquainted with excel pow point and social media platforms has excellent german and english skills any other languages are appreciated we are looking for someone who is driven takes the initiative learns fasen and works autonomously curious adaptable and flexible preferring new challenges over routines entrepreneurial with a can do attitude and is keen to learn able to juggle multiple projects and work with tight deadlines able to digest complex information form own point of view and communicate it a clear and relevant way passionate about business models performance marketing and deal structuring compensation the associate position is full time week and based vienna the minimum salary offer starts at eur2 a month and is negotiable depending on education and previous work experience if you fit the profile please send your resume and application to and we ll be touch feel free to include links to any websites or other sources where we might learn more about you e g personal blog twitter kontakt speedinvest heroes consulting gmbh faulmanngasse wien finance jobs produkt karriere at gmbh

title: Project Manager Systems (m/f)
description: as a project manager systems you support the overall coordination of the renewal of our different systems throughout the organization to strengthen processes finance hr grant management and fundraising you support the respective other project managers by preparing relevant information managing interfaces and coordinating and monitoring monthly meetings of the internal steering group this role you further take the lead for the implementation and roll out of new finance systems our organization close co ordination with the finance hub manager particular you manage the implementation of a bookkeeping software and surrounding processes as well as the further development of a business intelligence software you are responsible for the full project management cycles including analysing different software suppliers aligning the needs of all stakeholders across different functions and countries within the organization implementation and data migration as well as the relevant training of staff your profile you have excellent project management skills and profound experience the integration of software systems organizational context you most particularly bring along relevant experience with finance systems and ideally a solid bookkeeping background as a communicative person that thinks out of the box you support the stakeholders with your well structured approach you are open minded and integrative personality with a hands on mentality to bring things on the ground enforcing your ideas and collaborating international and diverse structure is a common way of working for you your participatory style motivates the team and drives them to excellent performance very good written and oral communication skills english and german are a prerequisite for this role we are looking for a candidate with great interest international development and human rights and high commitment to light for the world s mandate and values working towards the inclusion of persons with disabilities what we can offer as employer we are offering outstanding opportunity to bring about change through international development organization with strong expertise and a growing profile we are committed to giving our colleagues space to explore new directions en new ideas and to excel as individuals through and with their team we are a professional team that strives towards continuous development we believe participatory leadership and expect you to contribute your expertise and ideas we believe that learning from mistakes is important way of developing the location of employment is vienna some international travel be required for this position annual gross salary of approximately eur depending on qualification is foreseen we are looking forward to receiving your application latest by july online under a complete cv and indication of your salary requirements are important parts of this please let us know why you would like to join our team and why you consider yourself a suitable candidate for the position light for the world international mona köhlern human resources niederhofstraße a vienna austria we welcome applications from people with disabilities title: Manager Financial Planning & Analysis PDD ES EMEA
description: eaton s pdd division has opening for a manager financial planning analysis pdd emea location vienna austria primary function this position manages all financial planning and analysis related activities of the pd division this responsibility covers regular activities such as the ones related to month end close forecasting profit plan or strategicen plan as well as any ad hoc requirements such as emea business review or ebea the person manages division processes such as cost out and capex including the business support for operations the manager financial planning assumes the cost controlling responsibility for the division headquarter driving efficiency across those division processes including its plants and being advisor to the plants on those is a key attribute of the position holder particular following the integration of the former ess division essential functions manages all financial reporting requirements of the division verifies the accuracy of the reports and insures their adherence to prescribed schedules policies and procedures manages the preparation of and analyzes financial forecasts as required for divisional levels manages the annual profit planning process for the division provides guidance training and assistance to the personnel the finance organization the plants supervises work of senior financial analyst manages the financial reporting and follow up of the division s monthly capex review and cost out activities support of the division s director operations provides the financial data related to vpp and other bonus schemes and supports hr ensuring the financial integrity of those figures and advises on the financial aspects of those bonus schemes oversees the division compliance activities bsr planning follow up dsa narratives elc follow up repletter qualifications bachelor s degree finance or accounting minimum of years of relevant experience solid knowledge of erp systems sap oracle preferably encore fluent english written oral plus another european language solid knowledge of us gaap sox ideally some experience managing and developing people the individual is able to work under pressure possesses very good communication skills thinks a creative manner and is solutions orientated is able to work independently is able to delegate what eaton offers competitive compensation and benefits package excellent working environment safety and ethics are really important for us culture values eaton is more than the products we invent and produce the way we do business is just as important at eaton our values and culture define who we are both individually and as organization and direct our activities every day inclusion diversity openness to diversity widens our access to the best talent inclusion allows us to engage that talent fully about eaton eaton is a pow management company with sales of billion eaton provides energy efficient solutions that help our customers effectively manage title: Vice President (VP) of Finance
description: vienna austria finance description at smartassistant we develop and distribute a software solution that helps people choose products services and solutions that match their needs much fast and smarter we are the global leading technology provider for interactive advice solutions across all channels online mobile and the store smartassistant is used by the world s leading companies a variety of industries and languages and has been applied to well over different product categories ranging from electronics to home appliances fashion products b2b products and services and more for more information and examples please visit as part of its growth strategy smartassistant is looking for entrepreneurial candidate to help set up our finance reporting and analysis function the candidate leading the finance function be responsible for setting up all finance processes and reporting systems including budgeting forecast transfer pricing system hedging and other policies responsibilities set up direct and coordinate financial planning and budget management set up and maintain hedging policy set up and maintain transfer pricing system manage preparation of consolidated financial statements and reports for internal and external purposes manage tax optimization manage cash flow and support fundraising activities with equity investors and banks financial and liquidity forecasts manage grants applications and coordination ensure compliance with state financial reporting requirements coordinate financial audits and provide recommendations for procedural improvements represent the company externally to government agencies auditors banks oversee daily operations of the finance and accounting department recruit train supervise and evaluate department staff requirements university degree economics tax finance or business administration five to ten years experience a mid to senior level finance position two to four years experience at big four would be advantage fluent german and english speaker knowledge of finance accounting budgeting and cost control principles including generally accepted accounting principles knowledge of automated financial and accounting reporting systems ability to analyze financial data and prepare financial reports statements and projections working knowledge of short and long term budgeting and forecasting benefits minimum gross salary of eur year overpayment possible depending on qualifications and experience office the heart of the city work international environment clear structure with goen for it attitude we are on a mission to change the way people shop and decide because we are facing new exciting tasks everyday we need people like you to help us to provide the highest quality solutions for our clients sounds like a good challenge apply today be smart tomorrow kontakt smart information systems gmbh bayerngasse wien finance jobs produkt karriere at gmbh

description: my success formula be passionate about the details people like him need people like you why do we attract innovativ driven and successful people as customers because that s exactly who we hire as employees accountable committed reliable sounds like you then why not apply for a job with us prudential affairs specialist regulatory and legislative matters m f erst group founded as the first austrian savings bank and today it is one of the largest banking groups central and eastern europe cee as attractive employer erst group offers interesting career opportunities international environment group prudential affairs acts as group wide competence center and advises all erst group members particular erst group bank ag erst bank oesterreichisch sparkassen ag austrian savings banks on all bank regulatory and legislative matters group prudential affairs supports and coordinates the activities of erst group members towards the supervisory authorities e g european central bank national competent authorities fma and oenb and is inter alia responsible for supervisory procedures incl procedures related to information approval or notification obligations requests from and to supervisory authorities investigation procedures on site inspections support the execution of measures imposed by the supervisory authority administrativ criminal law etc taking care of all topics or internal projects with regulatory implication e g restructuring activities within erst group as well as steering coordination and monitoring of supervisory related activities within erst group legal services on banking regulation law formulate interpretations expert opinions about legal provisions with focus on banking and capital market law bwg spg fma onb eba standards eu regulations directives etc provide legal support the field of strategicen developments e g sparkassen haftungsverbund representation of interests of erst group co ordinates positions of erst group forwards the positions of the group to external parties bmf fma oenb wkö commission etc take part negotiations the field of legislative affairs monitoring and tracking of regulatory standards and their implementation you develop and support with regard to communication towards the supervisory authorities and group wide steering coordinate and monitor supervisory related activities within erst group act as internal and external contact person for regulatory affairs e g approval processes inquiries on site examinations etc on national international and cross border level and representation towards these stakeholders participate internal projects as far as regulatory and legislative matters are concerned develop and co ordinate views positions of the group for issues concerning banking and capital market law and provide strategicen support negotiations with authorities e g bmf commission council etc represent the interests of the group different panel of experts support the field of banking and capital market law interpretation of existing and forthcoming legislation provide professional support to all holding departments concerning the implementation of legal provisions especially banking and capital market law have a master degree austrian or international laws or business administration or any other equivalent education have minimum three years professional experience the field of bank regulatory and legislative matters because of previous working experience a supervisory authority or the banking sector are a specialist with broad knowledge national and or international banking law bwg wag crd crr and profound knowledge of the legal framework and requirements especially linked to new eu directives and austrian banking act have analytical thinking organizational and negotiation skills willingness to take responsibility and initiative commitment and flexibility are a team player with high communications skills speak fluent german and english we offer a highly interesting job opportunity the area of regulatory and legislative affairs comprising of diversified tasks and set with open motivated and flexible young team support your professional and personal development stehen out as a family friendly workplace and offer our employees flexible working time and modern workplace options company kindergarten health centre actively promote parental leave and many more family friendly measures guarantee a competitive and performance related salary dependent on your professional and personal qualifications we are obliged by law to quote title: Senior Financial Manager
description: westcore europe is a real estate investor manager with a specialization multi tenant industrial retail and office properties westcore is headquartered geneva switzerland with additional offices zurich london amsterdam and vienna westcore is a vertically integrated company with expertise all facets of real estate investment management including finance leasing redevelopment construction and building operations globally westcore has over eur1 billion assets under management eur300 million of which is located europe westcore offers the position of a senior financial manager with international responsibility based vienna senior financial manager m f vienna fulltime job description responsible for oversight of the accuracy and timeliness of accounting for all transactions within both corporate and property entities ensuring all transactions are recorded accordance with appropriate and local tax guidance as well as within company policies and procedures this includes the detailed review analysis of all corporate and property accounting transactions including management fees equity accounting accounts payable payroll treasury and fixed assets additions deletions fair value analyses forecasting budgeting and all other types of financial information analysis within the entities knowledge and experience bachelor s degree required with mba mst ma a plus five to ten years of progressive financial accounting and reporting experience prior work experience with big four accounting firm or other nationally recognized firm preferred experience with yardi or equivalent mid to large tier erp understanding of policy and procedure implementation and internal control documentation real estate accounting experience required principal responsibilities to perform this job successfully individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily the requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge skill and or ability required other duties may be assigned general duties monthly review of property and corporate financial statements including transactions supporting documentation detail general ledger financial statements balance sheet analyses journal entries and other supporting schedules calculations prepared by outsourced accounting team review and analysis of various documents including loan agreements management agreements lease and contract agreements operating agreements and various other documents order to analyze and ensure transactions are being recorded properly responsible for the reconciliation and timely processing for all types of related party billings responsible for monthly forecasts and annual corporate business plans implementation and review of various financial reports included monthly package which includes analysis of balance sheet rollforwards variance and trend analysis consolidations etc coordinate annual third party tax return preparation for corporate and property entities accordance with all local jurisdictions and regulations establish implement evaluate and enforce policies procedures and internal controls to improve overall efficiency of the accounting and other company departments facilitate and enhance communication and relationships with company management teams and third party investors creditors vendors etc coordinate review and monitor corporate cash needs including loan draws and capital calls qualifications to perform this job successfully individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily the title: Coordinator, Accounting Unit
description: last year wwf launched a new strategy that harnesses the strengths of the wwf network a shared vision focussing on six major goals water wildlife the ocean climate and energy forests and food and three key drivers of environmental problems markets finance and governance support of this strategy wwf undertook a redesign of its international secretariat that further unite wwf offices and its near staff around the world this help wwf to build stronger partnerships across the world with government business civil society and individuals together we deliver on wwf s ambitious goals we are recruiting the role of coordinator accounting unit for our international secretariat to help us achieve our new ambitious goals and build a future where people live harmony with nature location wwf international office vienna the role controls and coordinates with independence the opening closing and updating of banking arrangements for wwf international and its secretariat hubs and practice offices country programme offices to ensure compliance with wwf international policies and procedures ensures bank account databas is always accurate and up to dat main responsibilities controls the bank account arrangements for wwf international and all its some thirty plus country and programme offices pos secretariat hubs and practice offices particular by establishing and maintaining effective relationship with all offices co ordinating the opening closing and updating of banking arrangements handles related queries from the offices ensures that the office banking arrangements conform to wwf international policies and procedures organise e banking and signature changes for all accounts maintains accurate and complete databas of banking arrangements on ongoing basis including carrying out annual survey for audit and control purposes maintains a list of all exceptions for the offices when national regulations prevent wwf from applying the standard procedures acts as a liaison between wwf international s swiss based banking partners and the program offices arranging bank transfers from their accounts organises banking and legal confirmations for annual statutory external audit helps maintain and recommend improvements to policies and procedures particularly those relating to banking arrangements liaises with notaries to obtain legalized documents when needed supports the implementation of banking related projects such as e banking when needed acts as back up for accountant cash management and trains own back up supports the head of accounting controlling organising travel arrangements and meetings handling various correspondence and drafting various documents eg pow point tracks holidays for the accounting team organises finance introduction meetings for all new starters at wwf secretariat hubs and practice offices performs other duties as and when required required qualifications skills and competencies a commercial diploma to years of experience general administration preferably with a bank or treasury team a multi cultural environment attention to detail strong organizational and administrativ skills flexibility initiative ability to work autonomously aptitude for manipulating data with computer systems knowledge of ms office suite including ms access is advantage excellent interpersonal and communication skills are required to work organisation with a wide range of staff from different cultures and functions proficiency english adheres to wwf s values which are knowledgeable optimistic determined and engaging how to apply upload your covering letter and cv on as one file we not accept applications without cv and covering letter work permit restrictions may apply minimum annual gross salary eur deadline for applications july wwf is equal opportunity employer and committed to having a diverse workforce kontakt wwf international danub carpathian programm ottakringerstrasse wien finance jobs
